verses.arabic: لَمْ يَكُنِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.transliteration: Lam yakuni alladhina kafaru min ahli al-kitabi wal-mushrikin munfakkina hatta ta'tiyahumu al-bayyinah
verses.translation: Those who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists were not to be parted [from misbelief] until there came to them clear evidence

verses.arabic: رَسُولٌ مِّنَ اللَّهِ يَتْلُو صُحُفًا مُّطَهَّرَةً
verses.transliteration: Rasulun mina Allahi yatlu suhufan mutahharah
verses.translation: A Messenger from Allah, reciting purified scriptures

verses.arabic: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ إِلَّا مِن بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.transliteration: Wa ma tafarraqa alladhina utu al-kitaba illa min ba'di ma ja'atihumu al-bayyinah
verses.translation: Nor did those who were given the Scripture become divided until after there had come to them clear evidence

verses.arabic: وَمَا أُمِرُوا إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ الدِّينَ حُنَفَاءَ وَيُقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَيُؤْتُوا الزَّكَاةَ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ الْقَيِّمَةِ
verses.transliteration: Wa ma umiru illa liya'budu Allaha mukhlisina lahu ad-dina hunafa'a wa yuqimu as-salata wa yu'tu az-zakata wa dhalika dinu al-qayyimah
verses.translation: And they were not commanded except to worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion, inclining to truth, and to establish prayer and to give zakah. And that is the correct religion

verses.arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ فِي نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أُولَٰئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ الْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.transliteration: Inna alladhina kafaru min ahli al-kitabi wal-mushrikin fi nari jahannama khalidina fiha ula'ika hum sharru al-bariyyah
verses.translation: Indeed, those who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists will be in the fire of Hell, abiding eternally therein. Those are the worst of creatures

verses.arabic: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ أُولَٰئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ الْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.transliteration: Inna alladhina amanu wa 'amilu as-salihati ula'ika hum khayru al-bariyyah
verses.translation: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - those are the best of creatures

verses.arabic: جَزَاؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّاتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا رَّضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا عَنْهُ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُ
verses.transliteration: Jaza'uhum 'inda rabbihim jannatu 'adnin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu khalidina fiha abadan radiya Allahu 'anhum wa radu 'anhu dhalika liman khashiya rabbah
verses.translation: Their reward with Allah will be gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever, Allah being pleased with them and they with Him. That is for whoever has feared his Lord
